Figurative Meaning (Contextualized Defin: Someone is crying secretly or quietly in pain or sorrow

Cultural Origin or Historical Reference: Common in northern Ilocos literature describing restrained emotional expression
First Example Sentence: Agsangit ti mata ti igid idi sinabatna ti bad news manipud idiay balay.

Third Example Sentence: No adda panubok, agsangit ti mata ti igid dagiti agtignay a pusok.

Second Example Sentence: Ti agbasol, nasukatan ti karne—awan ti makaikasar.
Third Example Sentence: Ammom met nga isuna ti manguray, isu nga nasukatan ti karne idi napasamak dayta.
